original: @99b ` // nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
analyzed: @99b ` // nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
translated: The sadhana of Kṛṣṇa with three faces and six arms

original: ` // dpal gshin rje gshed nag po la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽gus pa yis ni bla ma yi //
analyzed: ` // dpal gshin rje gshed nag po la phyag 'tshal lo // gus pa yis ni bla ma yi //
translated: Homage to glorious Kṛṣṇa-Yamāri.🔽With devotion, I pay homage

original: zhabs kyi padmar phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: zhabs kyi padmar phyag 'tshal te //
translated: at the lotus feet of the guru.

original: bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis //🔽nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis // nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i //
translated: By the kindness of the guru's face,🔽I will explain the concise sadhana

original: mdor bsdus pa yi sgrub thabs bshad //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa yi sgrub thabs bshad //
translated: of Kṛṣṇa with three faces and six arms.

original: dang por rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis //
analyzed: dang por rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis //
translated: First, the lord of yogins

original: dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni //
analyzed: dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni //
translated: should go to an isolated place

original: stong pa'i sems la mnyam gzhag ste //
analyzed: stong pa'i sems la mnyam gzhag ste //
translated: and rest evenly in the mind of emptiness.

original: snying gar padma 'dab brgyad pa //
analyzed: snying gar padma 'dab brgyad pa //
translated: At the heart, an eight-petaled lotus,

original: de'i steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de'i steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: above that, a sun maṇḍala,

original: de yi steng du h'um bsams te //
analyzed: de yi steng du h'um bsams te //
translated: and above that, imagine a hūṃ.

original: h'um las 'od byung mdun du ni //
analyzed: h'um las 'od byung mdun du ni //
translated: From the hūṃ, light shines forth in front,

original: bla ma mkha' 'gro bzhugs par bsam //
analyzed: bla ma mkha' 'gro bzhugs par bsam //
translated: and one imagines the guru and ḍākinīs residing there.

original: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod byas la //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod byas la //
translated: One should pay homage and make offerings,

original: sdig bshags la sogs tshogs su 'gyur //
analyzed: sdig bshags la sogs tshogs su 'gyur //
translated: and confess negative actions and so forth.

original: de nas snying gar h'um las ni //
analyzed: de nas snying gar h'um las ni //
translated: Then, from the hūṃ at the heart,

original: 'od byung lus ngag bag chags rnams //
analyzed: 'od byung lus ngag bag chags rnams //
translated: Having burned the body, speech, and habitual tendencies,

original: bsregs nas stong pa nyid du bsgom //
analyzed: bsregs nas stong pa nyid du bsgom //
translated: meditate on emptiness.

original: de ni ye shes tshogs yin no //
analyzed: de ni ye shes tshogs yin no //
translated: That is the accumulation of wisdom.

original: sems ni h'um gi rnam par bsam //
analyzed: sems ni h'um gi rnam par bsam //
translated: The mind is imagined in the form of hūṃ.

original: h'um las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur //
analyzed: h'um las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur //
translated: From hūṃ, a five-pronged vajra arises.

original: rdo rje las ni sku bskyed do //
analyzed: rdo rje las ni sku bskyed do //
translated: From the vajra, the body is generated.🔽Black in color, with three faces and six arms,

original: zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog gnag / g-yas dkar g-yon dmar dbus mthing zhal ;
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog gnag / g-yas dkar g-yon dmar dbus mthing zhal ;
translated: the right face is white, the left face is red, and the central face is blue.

original: / spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal //
analyzed: / spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal //
translated: With three eyes, a gaping mouth, and bared fangs,

original: dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes //🔽gri gug rdo rje ral gri gsum //🔽g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa yin //🔽bhandha padma 'khor lo gsum //
analyzed: dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes // gri gug rdo rje ral gri gsum // g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa yin // bhandha padma 'khor lo gsum //
translated: black hair stands upward.🔽In the right hands he holds a flaying knife, a vajra, and a sword.

original: g-yon pa'i phyag na bsnams pa yin //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag na bsnams pa yin //
translated: In the left hands he holds a skull cup, a lotus, and a chakram.

original: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang gsus po @100a * //
analyzed: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang gsus po @100a * //
translated: With his right leg extended and left leg drawn in,🔽he has a large belly.

original: che ; / lha mo phag mo'i mgul nas 'khyud //🔽phag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
analyzed: che ; / lha mo phag mo'i mgul nas 'khyud // phag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
translated: He embraces the goddess Vārāhī around the neck.🔽Vārāhī has one face and two arms.

original: gri gug dang ni bhandha g-yon //
analyzed: gri gug dang ni bhandha g-yon //
translated: She holds a flaying knife and a skull cup in the left.

original: gtso bo'i mgul nas 'khyud pa'i tshul //
analyzed: gtso bo'i mgul nas 'khyud pa'i tshul //
translated: She embraces the principal’s neck.

original: gnyis su med pa'i gnas na bzhugs //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i gnas na bzhugs //
translated: Abides in the state of nonduality.🔽The six sense powers, eyes, body, and so forth,

original: mig dang lus sogs dbang po drug / sangs rgyas drug kyang yod par bsam //
analyzed: mig dang lus sogs dbang po drug / sangs rgyas drug kyang yod par bsam //
translated: Are also thought of as the six buddhas.

original: sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlabs //
translated: Blessing with body, speech, and mind,

original: snying ga'i h'um las 'od byung bsam //
analyzed: snying ga'i h'um las 'od byung bsam //
translated: Light is thought to come from the hūṃ at the heart.

original: ye shes mkha' 'gro spyan drangs te //
analyzed: ye shes mkha' 'gro spyan drangs te //
translated: The awareness dakini is invited

original: tshig gi dbang yang blang bar bya //
analyzed: tshig gi dbang yang blang bar bya //
translated: And the word empowerment is also taken.

original: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
analyzed: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
translated: All bhagavān tathāgatas,

original: bcom ldan mnga' bdag chen po rnams //
analyzed: bcom ldan mnga' bdag chen po rnams //
translated: Bhagavān great lords,

original: khyod kyis bdag la dbang bskur gsol //
analyzed: khyod kyis bdag la dbang bskur gsol //
translated: Please confer the empowerment upon me.

original: de skad bdag gis dbang blangs pas //
analyzed: de skad bdag gis dbang blangs pas //
translated: Having said that, I take the empowerment.

original: ye shes rdo rje chu rgyun gyis //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje chu rgyun gyis //
translated: The stream of the vajra of awareness

original: bdag gi spyi bor dbang bskur bas //
analyzed: bdag gi spyi bor dbang bskur bas //
translated: Is conferred on my head.

original: rigs lnga'i cod pan gyur par bsam //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i cod pan gyur par bsam //
translated: I think of it as becoming the crown of the five families.

original: mchod dang bstod dang bdud rtsi bza' //
analyzed: mchod dang bstod dang bdud rtsi bza' //
translated: Make offerings, praise, and eat the elixir.

original: de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni //
analyzed: de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni //
translated: Then the recitation is done.

original: bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin no //
translated: This is the mantra of the recitation:

original: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ṣṭṛīḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: thams cad grub pa'i don du bzlas //
analyzed: thams cad grub pa'i don du bzlas //
translated: Recite for the sake of accomplishing everything.

original: gtor ma'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: gtor ma'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is the mantra of the bali offering:

original: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /🔽a'a dya nu tpanna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am / a'a dya nu tpanna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ akāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām,🔽ādya anutpannatva ātāḥ.

original: bar chad thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bar chad thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to protect against all obstacles,

original: des ni gtor ma sbyin par bya ;
analyzed: des ni gtor ma sbyin par bya ;
translated: one should give the bali offering.

original: / de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: / de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of generation.

original: de nas rnal 'byor ngal bso bya //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor ngal bso bya //
translated: Then the yogin should rest.

original: snying ga'i h'um gi 'od zer gyis //
analyzed: snying ga'i h'um gi 'od zer gyis //
translated: Light rays from the hūṃ at the heart

original: khams gsum ma lus kun la khyab //
analyzed: khams gsum ma lus kun la khyab //
translated: pervade the entire three realms.

original: kun kyang sangs rgyas sku ru 'gyur //
analyzed: kun kyang sangs rgyas sku ru 'gyur //
translated: All become the form of the Buddha.

original: gyur pa kun kyang bdag la bsdu //🔽bdag kyang h'um la bsdus byas la //
analyzed: gyur pa kun kyang bdag la bsdu // bdag kyang h'um la bsdus byas la //
translated: All that has become is gathered into me.🔽I am also gathered into the hūṃ.

original: h'um yang thig ler 'gro bar bsgom //
analyzed: h'um yang thig ler 'gro bar bsgom //
translated: The hūṃ also dissolves into the bindu.

original: rtog pa yang dag spangs pa ste //
analyzed: rtog pa yang dag spangs pa ste //
translated: It is free from conceptual thoughts

original: yang dag bde ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag bde ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: and the form of utterly pure bliss.

original: phyag med zhal med kha dog med //
analyzed: phyag med zhal med kha dog med //
translated: It is without arms, without a face, and without color.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: It is the characteristic of supreme joy.

original: 'di byas bsod nams gang thob pas //
analyzed: 'di byas bsod nams gang thob pas //
translated: Whatever merit is obtained by doing this

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shog / nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shog / nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The sādhana of Kṛṣṇa with three faces and six arms,

original: slob dpon la li ta badzra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon la li ta badzra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: composed by the master Lalitavajra, is complete.
